channel.title: Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?
channel.description:
Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?
When I first came to this forum and when I stayed for a while, there were a lot of people, a lot of scripters, and a lot of posts. What happened? Why did it slow down? Or am I just crazy lol.

item.title: Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:59, topic:180375”][quote author=Baros Rocks link=topic=241672.msg2052036#msg2052036 date=1202967251]

Scroll down and look at January 2008 and January 2007 and look at the huge differences in topics. In January 2008 we had 7,600 topics created and 57,000 posts in January 2007 we had 14,052 topics created and 131462 posts.

Wasn’t moparisthebest and moparscape merged then? or was that after
[/quote]
i think they got separated in the beginning of 2006 [/quote]
o_O

But i’ve been on everyday at school in the morning and at lunch, i would post in the morning, sometimes get a replie, then get to lunch and see, usually there IS a reply to the post. But there are exceptions.the most dead section i would have to say is the SRL forum, i don’t see much in that setion.

Read full topic
item.source: Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?

item.title: Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Swordskid61, post:53, topic:180375”][quote author=error.login link=topic=241672.msg2050985#msg2050985 date=1202919303]

Lets all pitch in and create and mmo for MITB

why? we cant all make a mmo. most of the people here can only work alone.
IDEAS! we could go into teams of 1-5 and have a competition?
[/quote]

we need moar ideas.

we have enough programmers around here to do something.[/quote]

probably so. on planethell they have a habbo hotel Private server.

TGWGO coded it by himself as far as i know.

i think we could either make a private server of something other than RS or we could just create a new game.

/edit

item.source: Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?

item.title: Does this forum seem A LOT slower or is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

exe626:

Well. Most of the people have quit RS, which this site is built around. There’s a few in graphics, a few in programming, others just post around the forums. What we need is some new, something to base the forums off of. Yes, Runescape cheating will never die, and it’ll be here forever, but we need something that the community will find interest in.

Theres nothing to base it on. RuneScape was it.

Tbh, there is really nothing else.

Read full topic

i tried on 3 pc’s but still he same.[/quote]
